Merge branch 'master' of https://github.com/reicast/emulator
PANDORA: Enabled VMU
PANDORA: fixed analog Joystick (cannot used SDL ones without SDL_Init)
Spun file browser off as Fragment. Added CDI/cdi filters to GL2JNIActivity in manifest.

File browser 'BOOT BIOS' now optional. Can set to also display 'SELECT CURRENT FOLDER' instead using fragment arguments. Starting the emu is now handled by the fragment container instead of the FileBrowser class. Class passes cd image URI to fragment callback when image is selected. Likewise, 'SELECT CURRENT FOLDER' will pass the CWD as a URI to another callback in the fragment container. This is in preparation for re-using the file browser for the options activity.
Removed 'reicast' header from file browser layout. Relocated to layout for fragment container.
Added do-nothing options activity. Hooked it up to the button in the fragment container.
Added resource id to ScrollView in file browser. Set it up to scroll to the top of the list automatically on directory navigation instead of showing the previous directory scroll location.
PANDORA: Now using SDL_Init, and Joystick with SDL too
Kinda hooked up options a little, something weird going on in there... Added a simple auto-detect to map for PS3 controllers with default to Ouya controller.
fixed the last commit. also forgot to mention controller names require api 16.
Re-enabled nvram saving and made to save as dc_flash.bin instead.
Reverted file name change per PsyMan. Still seems to be working. Didn't understand the details. Thanks :)
PANDORA: Fix nvram save at exit
Update README.md
Update README.md
Fix a resource leak in nixprof.cpp.

Do index testing before actually accessing the array pointers with it in function tryfit() in newdc/rend/gles/gles.cpp.

Technically only the i<128 checks matter, but moved them all 'forward' in the if statements for consistency.
Fix a typo in a function name in newdc/cfg/cfg.cpp. Should be ParseFile, not PaseFile.
Fix a printf statement in newdc/hw/sh4/sh4_mmr.cpp. Only specified the write address in the statement, however the data was also passed too.

Fix accidental wrong comparison in newdc/hw/sh4/dyna/shil.cpp. '==' has a higher precedence than '&'. Since v is tested for equality in the initial if statement header (if (v >= 0)) this was likely an error, and the parenthesized expression was meant to be used.
Remove a duplicated boolean expression from function srt_waw() in newdc/hw/sh4/dyna/shil.cpp.
Fix precedence order in newdc/hw/sh4/dyna/decoder.cpp. && has a higher precedence than ||. Considering the || left and right expressions test for similar things, I believe this was the intent.
Fix an array overflow possibility in gldraw.cpp. Vertex's col array is only has a size of 4 not 8.
Fix an incorrect swap in newdc/hw/aica/aica_if.cpp. tmp should be assigned to dst, not src, because as it was before it was the equivalent of 'dst = dst;'

Fix incorrect memcpy source string in function PatchRegion0 newdc/imgread/common.cpp. Defined as a length of 8, but was actually 11.

Also fixed some typos in the logging messages.

that cannot view the slider menu. The configuration options have been
expanded to work toward adding all emu.cfg values as visual. Options

Fix directory selection when BIOS is in an alternate folder

This will allow selecting a different folder on the first run instead
of having to place everything in /sdcard/dc first and then pick a new
folder to later move to. This will still notify the user of
requirements for having the BIOS in the /dc folder if they do not pick
an alternate location at this time.

Open up compatibility mode to any device that attempts it

This adds compatibility mode as an option in 3.0+, not just for
unsupported APIs. This allows attempting to use controllers that are
otherwise undetected by standard input.

Allow the custom controller config to override any other map

By using the compatibility mode switch, the custom key and identifier
assigned to a specific controller should be the first items used to
create the key mappings. At worst, this will provide basic button and
dpad support if no other detection is possible for the specific
controller device.
Make sure controller identification fails if none are defined
